\section*{Step 1}

```{r}
num_drive <- drive %>% select(Month,`Local Government Authority`) %>% count(Month,`Local Government Authority`)%>% arrange(desc(Month)) 

pass_drive_percentage <- drive %>% select(Month,`Local Government Authority`,`Exam Result`) %>% count(Month,`Local Government Authority`,`Exam Result`) %>% arrange(desc(Month)) %>% rename(num = n) %>% right_join(num_drive) %>% mutate(percentage = num/n) %>% filter(`Exam Result` == 'PASS') %>% rename(pass_num = num, tatal_num = n) %>% select(-`Exam Result`) %>%
 separate(col = Month, into = c("Year","Month"),"-")
```

```{r}
num_month_drive <- drive %>% select(Month,`Local Government Authority`) %>% count(Month)

num_month_drive_percentage <- drive %>% select(Month,`Local Government Authority`,`Exam Result`) %>% count(Month,`Exam Result`)%>% arrange(desc(Month)) %>% rename(num = n) %>% right_join(num_month_drive)%>% mutate(month_percentage = num/n) %>% filter(`Exam Result` == 'PASS') %>% rename(pass_num = num, tatal_num = n) %>% select(-`Exam Result`) %>%
 separate(col = Month, into = c("Year","Month"),"-")
```
